symptoms.name: Lower grades
symptoms.question: Do you find that your grades are almost always lower than your peers?

symptoms.name: Pace of education
symptoms.question: Do you struggle to keep up with the speed required in education

symptoms.name: Repeating of years
symptoms.question: Have you ever had to repeat a year in school?

symptoms.name: Perceived difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you find that you have to put in more effort than others to understand concepts?

symptoms.name: Perceived intelligence
symptoms.question: Do you feel that you are less intelligent than your peers?

symptoms.name: Believed learning disability
symptoms.question: Do you believe that you have a learning disability?

symptoms.name: slow reading
symptoms.question: Do you read slowly or have trouble keeping up?

symptoms.name: spelling difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you often spell words incorrectly or mix up letter order?

symptoms.name: difficulty decoding words
symptoms.question: Do you find it difficult to decode unfamiliar words?

symptoms.name: persistent reading issues
symptoms.question: Do you consistently struggle with reading despite practice?

symptoms.name: persistent reading issues
